chinese: [DDM Win 2.2]debug read 顯示不正確的值00000000, 應為00000001
title: [DDM Win 2.2] Incorrect value after order "DDM /DebugRead 50FF "C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt" command.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.28
PC: Dell Inspiron 7510
OS version: Windows 11 Home 22621.1992
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) UHD Graphics


Monitor / FW : U3421WE/M2B107
Input Source : USB-C
description:
#112 Debug Mode On

Setup:
1. Use USB-C from plarform to DUT
2. Open command Prompt from PC. (search for "cmd")
3. Type following in command prompt: cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2

1. Type following command to turn on debug mode:
Windows: DDM /DebugWrite 50FF 0001
 console response: DebugWrite 50FF 0001 = Ok
2. Type following command to read debug mode status:
Windows: DDM /DebugRead 50FF "C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt"
console response: DebugRead 50ff C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt = 00000000

Result: 
DebugWrite 50ff 0001 = Ok
DebugRead 50ff C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt = 00000000
Expectation: 
DebugWrite 50ff 0001 = Ok
DebugRead 50ff C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt = 00000001

Note: Use U2722DE Pass
Monitor / FW : U2722DE/M3T107
Input Source : USB-C
console response: 
DebugWrite 50ff 0001 = Ok
DebugRead 50ff C:\temp\ddm-reply.txt = 00000001

system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.28
PC1 model : latitude 7310 (win11)
OS version : Windows 11 Pro (22H2) 22621.1848
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) UHD Graphics

Monitor / FW : U2424HE / M3B101

description:
Setup:
1. Open command Prompt from PC. (search for "cmd")

2. Enter cmd "DDM /Console start /[Monitor_Service Tag]:Rotate 90 /[Monitor_Service Tag]:ReadOrientation"

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2] 韌體已成功更新訊息沒有彈跳出
title: [DDM Win 2.2]  After FW updated successfully, the system notification "Updated the firmware successfully" is not displayed.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.2.0.28
PC model :  Dell XPS 17 9710
OS Name : Windows 11 Pro 22621.1992
Graphics Chipset :  Intel UHD Graphics & NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU

Monitor1 / FW: P2422HE, M2B205
Input Source1: USB-C
Monitor1 / FW: P2422HE, M2B205
Input Source2: USB-C
description:
Scenario#1
SETUP: DELL XPS 9710/WIN 11 HOME
PC > USB C cable > DUT1 
PC > USB C cable > DUT2

1. Issue the command on CMD: ddm /fwupdate defer
2. Click Right now button.
3. After FW updated successfully & checked the BOTH OSD. 
System notification is NOT displayed "Updated the firmware for [P2422HE]_[service tag] successfully".
4. RECOVER: the notification is displayed after PC reboot


Result : after completed updating both FW & OSD, DDM hanged.
Expectation : after finishing both FW, an Update successfully notification should pop out.

Scenario#2
SETUP: DELL XPS 9710/WIN 11 HOME
PC > USB C cable > DUT1 
PC > USB C cable > DUT2

ddm /fwupdate force

1. Issue the command on CMD: ddm /fwupdate force
2. Click Right now button.
3. After FW updated successfully & checked the BOTH OSD. 
System notification is NOT displayed "Updated the firmware for [P2422HE]_[service tag] successfully".
4. RECOVER: the notification is displayed after PC reboot

Result : after completed updating both FW & OSD, DDM hanged.
Expectation : after finishing both FW, an Update successfully notification should pop out.

chinese:
[DDM Win 2.2]  SW Security
Symlink Check, 舊版更新到最新版後, folder裡面的symlink 還留著
title: [DDM Win 2.2] After SW upgraded, the Symlink is still present in the installation directory.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.28
PC1 model : DELL Precision 5820
OS Name : Windows 10 Home (22H2) 19045.3208
Graphics Chipset : AMD Radeon W5500


Monitor1 / FW : U2720Q / M2T105
Input Source1 : DP
description:
1. Log in to the system with a Standard User Account
2. Create a folder named "Test" under "C:\Program Files (x86)\". 
3. Create a folder named "Testing" under "C:\Program Files (x86)\Test".
4. Install previous DDM version 2.2.0.25
5. Open terminal, change path to "C:\Users\Username\AppData\Local\Dell Display Manager"
6. Enter the command "mklink /J Test “C:\Program Files (x86)\Test" to create a Symlink
    (A Symlink with the name "Test" is created and it is pointing to C:\Program Files (x86)\Test. )
7. Install current DDM version 2.2.0.28
8. Check if any Symlink is present in installation folder.

Result : Symlink is still present in the folder where installer created.
Expectation : 
If the Symlink is present in the directory, mark the test case as Unsafe/Failed.
If there is no Symlink present in the directory, mark the test case as Safe/Passed.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2] 透過Daisy Chain連接, 無法更新DUT2 FW

system_information:

PC model : Alienware m16 R1
OS Name : Windows 11 Pro (22H2), 22621.1992

DUT2: U3224KB/M2T101 to M2T103

Input Source: PC -- [Thunderbolt] -- DUT1 -- [Thunderbolt] -- DUT2
description:
1. Connect 2 monitors that the model are the same by Daisy Chain
2. Both DUT have new Firmware available.
3. Launch DDM
4. Main menu > Settings icon > Update tab > DUT1 > Check Update button.
5. Click Update button on DUT1. After download completed, proceed with ISP installation.
6. After ISP installation completed
7. Open Software > Main menu > Settings icon > Update tab > DUT2 > Check Update button. 
8. Click Update button on DUT2. After download completed, proceed with ISP installation

DUT1: U3224KB, Service Tag: CN073K0, SN: 808466764
DUT2: U3224KB, Service Tag: KKKKKKC, SN: 1263225667 

Result: Unable to update DUT2 FW
Expectation: DUT2 FW can be updated successfully through Daisy Chain connection.

chinese: [DDM2.2] Schedule - B/C transitioning behavior is implemented incorrectly
title: [DDM2.2] Schedule - B/C transitioning behavior is implemented incorrectly
description:
Fresh install. 

Turn on Schedule, setup: 

Day: B(60%)/C(40%) 

Night: B(40%)/C(30%) , time set at 130pm 

 

Different in B is 20 and C is 10. Expectation transitioning takes 4 phases, starting from 1230pm. 

Observation / issue: 

1245: Observed brightness reduced to 55% but contrast jump to 30% (refer to video 5) 

1300/1315: Subsequently on 2nd /3rd, nothing happen.  (refer to video 6 and 7)

1330: nothing change. After 2 min, navigate to Schedule, observed the screen brightness jump from 55% to 40%. (refer to video 8)

 

Log file attached. In between, no SetVCP takes place.

chinese: [DDM2.2] Scheduled Brightness unexpected set 0 brightness and contrast despite the profile is set to non-zero values
title: [DDM2.2] Scheduled Brightness unexpected set 0 brightness and contrast despite the profile is set to non-zero values
description:
Steps to reproduce

1.Connect monitor U2722DE through USB/HDMI
2.Launch DDM and navigates to Scheduled tab
3.Observe both profiles are read as 0% brightness and contrast (Note: the monitor brightness and contrast were not originally set to 0%)
4.The brightness and contrast remains at 0% even user adjusted the current profile to other values
5.Once closing DDM, it is revert to 0% brightness and contrast until the values are overwritten using the manual tab
6.This abnormality happens whenever user navigates to 0% profile and it will not restore the correct values after closing DDM from the foreground window. The screen will always remains at 0% brightness and contrast.

chinese: [DDM2.1.1] CIPS-32906: Unable to install on run Dell Display Manager Stand alone application without Admin profile
title: [DDM2.1.1] CIPS-32906: Unable to install on run Dell Display Manager Stand alone application without Admin profile
description:
Description 
Using Dell Display Manager DDM 2.1.1.36 connected to Dell monitors, customer is trying to deploy the application out by Microsoft SCCM. 
https://www.dell.com/support/home/en-us/drivers/driversdetails?driverid=vw7ky&oscode=wt64a&productcode=dell-display-manager-2.0

The app installs but upon opening it, it crashes right away after the initial splash screen. 
Customer is having to run the DDM app "As Administrator to get it to open and be usable. 

Customer found this in forums: 
https://www.dell.com/community/monitors/DDM-crashing-unless-i-run-as-admin/td-p/8358813

Upon installing Dell Optimizer, customer was then able install and run the Dell Display Manager successfully on Dell models. Their environment is about half Dell computers and about half Microsoft Surface laptops. All of these devices work fine with the Dell docks and monitors they have and even worked fine with the latest version of Dell DDM 2.1.1.36 when using their non-Microsoft profile username to run it. 

Issue persist on the MS Surface 3 systems, system crashes right away after the initial splash screen, Customer is still having to run the DDM app 'As Administrator to get it to open and be usable. 

Also, the current package of Dell Optimizer, version 4.0.310.0 installs an even older version of Dell DDM (2.0.0.139). This seems like step backwards since DDM is up to 2.1.1.36. 
https://www.dell.com/support/home/en-us/drivers/driversdetails?driverid=92tp7&oscode=640&productcode=latitude-15-7530-laptop

Ask of IPS: 
Determine if the stand alone version of Dell Display Manager is able to be installed without Admin rights and supports multiplatform PC hardware and can be used regardless of how the user profile is built

chinese: [DDM2.1.1] DDM Easy Arrange Problem on U4924DW with Surface Pros
title: [DDM2.1.1] DDM Easy Arrange Problem on U4924DW with Surface Pros
description:
Application Window Snapping Inverted - New

Switching on application snapping did fix the issue that was causing users to have to restart their computers, but it seems to have opened new issues unique to this feature. Frequently, if someone has to take their laptop to a conference room, when they return to their desk they find that the application snapping is appearing incorrectly. If I open the dell display manager app and navigate back to the Easy Arrange options, the profile options will display like the screen is inverted on its side. I’ve been fixing this by fulling exiting out of the DDM software and relaunching the app.

Application Snapping just doesn’t work - New

Finally, we’re running into a lot of sporadic periods where the application snapping just doesn’t work when trying to size a screen. When grabbing the top bar of an app, the cursor moves into a displayed section (and it turns blue), but when the mouse is released, the app will flash for a second like it’s resizing but stays where it was. I’ve attached a video of this issue to this email to give you a better idea of what’s happening.

chinese: [DDM2.2] Cannot export settings on other monitors via CLI
title: [DDM2.2] Cannot export settings on other monitors via CLI
description:
Reproduce Procedure:
1.Connect PC to two monitors, start DDM CLI console, and have DDM focus on one of them
2.Execute ddm.exe /1:ReadAssetAttributes and /2:ReadAssetAttributes to get monitors info.
3.Execute ddm.exe /1:ExportSettings C:\temp\model1.json to get settings from the 1st monitor
4.Execute ddm.exe /2:ExportSettings C:\temp\model2.json to get settings from the 2nd monitor
5.ddm.exe /2:AutoBrightness on
6.ddm.exe /2:AutoColorTemp on 
7.ddm.exe /1:PrimaryMonitorforSync on
8.ddm.exe /3:AutoBrightnessRangeLevel Low

Errors:
Both monitors' json files are the focus monitor and the monitor number is not consistent to other CLI commands.

Expect:
1.The json file should export right information for the target monitor
2.The target monitor number should be consistent to other CLI commands
3.No need to change DDM UI monitor focus to switch the setting export
4.CLI doc should be correct and consistent
5.CLI commands above should support monitor index and service tag

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2] 信號源為USB時，Rotation狀態錯誤
title: [DDM Win 2.2] When use USB-C input, import OSD settings from DP exported, the screen does not rotate with OSD.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.42
PC1 model : Acer Predator PH315-54-72VQ
OS version : Windows 10 Home (22H2) 19045.3208
Graphics Chipset : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Laptop GPU

Monitor/FW:U2424HE/M3T101
Input Source:USB C
description:
Setup:
1. PC <DP>DUT
2. PC<Upstream A to C>DUT

Test Step:
1. Launch DDM
2. Open CLI and type "cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2"
3. Adjust some OSD settings,especially changed Rotation value  
4. Type "DDM /ExportOSD c:\temp\OSDsettings.bin"
5. Unplug all cables, following by changing input source as USB-C
6. Perform Factory Reset, and wait for all prompt messages disappeared
7. Type"DDM /ImportOSD c:\temp\OSDsettings.bin", then Click "Yes" button
8. Check the screen

Result: Screen does not rotates with the OSD
Expectation: Screen rotates with the OSD

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2] MST時，OS旋轉不如預期
title: DDM Win 2.2] Performing MST connection with importOSD, screen does not rotate with OSD
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.42
PC1 model : Acer Predator PH315-54-72VQ
OS version : Windows 10 Home (22H2) 19045.3208
Graphics Chipset : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Laptop GPU

DUT1/FW:U2424HE/M3B101
Input Source:DP+USB A TO C
DUT2/FW:U2424HE/M3B101
Input Source:DP+USB A TO C
DUT3/FW:U2424HE/M3B101
Input Source:DP
description:
1. PC<DP+Upstream A to C>DUT1
2. Launch DDM
3. Open CLI and type "cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2"
4. Adjust some OSD settings on DUT1,changed Rotation value ,MST=ON,MMS=OFF
5. Type "DDM /ExportOSD c:\temp\OSDsettings.bin"
6. PC <DP+Upstream A to C> DUT2 <DP> DUT3
7. Factory Reset for DUT2 & DUT3
8. Set OSD on DUT2(MMS = OFF) & DUT3(MMS = ON)   
9. Type"DDM /ImportOSD c:\temp\OSDsettings.bin"and Click "Yes" button
10. Check screen

Result: issue1. DUT2 & DUT3 rotates with the OSD (FailureRate:1/4)
            issue2. Only DUT3  rotate with the OSD (FailureRate:1/4)
            issue3. DUT2 & DUT3 not rotate with the OSD (FailureRate:1/4)
Expectation: Only DUT2 rotates with the OSD

P.S. When Step8 to set the below case, The result are the same issue
        1) DUT2 & DUT3 (MMS=ON) 
        2) DUT2 & DUT3 (MMS=OFF)

chinese: [DDM Win2.2]接一台ALS與非ALS，Schedule開啟時，ALS螢幕仍可開關Synchronize

system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.0.43
PC1 model : Acer Predator PH315-54-72VQ
OS version : Windows 10 Home (22H2) 19045.3208
Graphics Chipset : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Laptop GPU

Input Source:HDMI
DUT2/FW:S2721QS/M2B105
Input Source:DP
description:
Setup:
PC<>DUT1 (ALS Monitor)
PC<>DUT2 (non-ALS Monitor)

Step:
1. Launch DDM > Brightness/Contrast
2. On DUT1, turn ON "Auto Brightness"
3. On DUT2, check "Synchronize between monitors" => It's gryed out
4. On DUT1, turn OFF "Auto Brightness"
5. On DUT2, turn ON Schedule
6. On DUT1, check "Synchronize between monitors"

Result: On ALS Monitor, "Synchronize between monitors" function does not become greyed out, which still can be turned ON/OFF.
Expectation: ALS Monitor sync with non-ALS Monitor, "Synchronize between monitors"  is greyed out.

system_information:

title: [DDM2.2] Telemetry consent page takes very long to load and prompt for the same users twice
description:
Steps to reproduce
1.Install DDM2.2.0.7 and launch DDM at the end of the installation*
2.Telemetry Consent page attempted to load but it reflects an empty page
3.It took about 1 min before showing up the contents
4.Reboot the system and consent loads again

     DDM is installed on standard user account and install with elevated privilege

Expected behavior
1.Telemetry consent should load immediately without showing the blank page
2.Upon system reboot, the same user account should not receive the telemetry consent page again

system_information:
DDM version: 2.2.1.31
PC: Asus UX435EG
OS version: Windows 10 Pro, 19045.1889

Monitor1 /FW: U2724DE /M3T101
Input Source1: C to C
Monitor2 /FW: U2724DE /M3T101
Input Source1: C to DP
description:
1. Connect with 2 DUT
2. Launch DDM
3. On Full UI > Brightness/Contrast tab > Auto page
4. Turn on all functions of ALS on DUT1
5. Turn off "Auto Brightness" and "Auto Color Temperature"
5. Change any setting of DUT2

Result: No prompt message pops up
Expectation: The prompt message "This is not your primary monitor. Do you want to proceed with the change and set this as Primary Monitor for Synchronization?" should pop up.

Epic Link : MDDM-2343
 
Dependencies : 
Linked Issues = Discovered while testing
Issue = MDDM-2465, MDDM-4782

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] 導入有設置過Schedule的檔案，Schedule呈現方式錯誤。(機率性發生)
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] When importing a file with Schedule, the Schedule is presented in the wrong way.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.2.1.31
PC: DELL OptiPlex 5090
OS version: Windows 11 Pro 22621.2428
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) UHD Graphics 750



Monitor1 /FW:  UP2720Q / M2B107
Input Source1: DP
Monitor2 /FW:  UP3221Q / M2B104
Input Source1: DP
Monitor3 /FW:  UP2720Q / M2B107
Input Source1: DP
Monitor4 /FW:  UP3221Q / M2B104
Input Source1: DP
description:
a) DUT1, DUT2, DUT3 and DUT4 are monitors with Luminance.
b) DUT1 and DUT3 are same model.
c) Connect PC1 to DUT1 and DUT2.

1. Launch DDM.
2. Full UI > Luminance > Schedule.
3. Change Schedule Day and Night Luminance settings to 250.
4. Turn on Synchronize.
5. Switch to Other Tab.
6. Click export.
7. Save the file.
8. Disconnect DUT1 and DUT2 from PC1.
9. Connect DUT3 and DUT4 to PC1.  
10. Launch DDM.
11. Full UI > Other.
12. Import the file from step 7.
13. Switch to Luminance Tab > Schedule.
14. Check Schedule of Luminance value.

Result: After importing the schedule values ​​to DUT 3 and DUT4, The Day and Night Luminance value of DUT3 are 250, and the Day and Night Luminance vaule of DUT4 are 150 .
Expextation: After importing the Schedule Luminance values of DUT3 and DUT4 ​​are 250.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] 連接含 DisplayPort的Type-C，用Daisy chain連接，第二台訊號會無法顯示
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] Connect Type-C with DisplayPort and use Daisy Chain connection, the second monitor has no signal.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.2.1.31
PC: Inspiron 5415(HBR3)
OS version: Windows 11 Home (22H2) 22621.2428
Graphics Chipset : AMD Radeon(TM) Graphics
PC: Precision 5550(HBR2)
OS version: Window 10 pro (20H2) 19042.2251
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) UHD Graphics

Monitor1FW:  U3425WE / 33B111
Input Source: Thunderbolt
Monitor2/FW:  U3425WE / 33B111
Input Source: Thunderbolt
description:
Setup: 
a) Connect monitor that support USB-C prioritization and OSD is not greyed out
b)
Using a laptop that supports HBR2 (Precision 5550)
The USB-C  on the left contains Thunderbolt
The USB-C  on the right contains DisplayPort only
c)
Using a laptop that supports HBR3 (Inspiron 5415)
The USB-C  on the left contains DisplayPort only
scenes 1:
1. Daisy Chain connection 
2. PC (HBR2)(USB-C  on the right side) <Thunderbolt cable> DUT1 <Thunderbolt cable> DUT2 
scenes 2:
1. Daisy Chain connection 
2. PC (HBR3)(USB-C  on the left side) <Thunderbolt cable> DUT1 <Thunderbolt cable> DUT2 

Result: The second screen signal will not be displayed.
Expectation: The second screen signal will be displayed.

2. Enter cmd "DDM /[Monitor1_Service Tag]:PowerNap ReduceBrightness /[Monitor2_Service Tag]:PowerNap ReduceBrightness"

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] DDM從DUT1拖曳至DUT2後退出重開DDM預設監視器仍然還是DUT1
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] The drop-down menu does not stay on the last used monitor.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.31
PC1 model : DELL Precision 7560
OS Name : Windows 10 Pro (22H2),
19045.3570
Graphics Chipset : Intel® UHD Graphics
for 11th Gen Intel® Processors
NVIDIA T1200 Laptop GPU

Monitor1 / FW : AW2725DF/33B104
Input Source1 : HDMI

Monitor2 / FW : AW2724DM/M2B102
Input Source1 : DP

Monitor3 : ROG Strix XG27AQ
Input Source1 : DP
description:
Scenario#1
1. Click the DDM icon > Menu launcher or Main menu
2. Drag DDM to DUT2
3. Reconnect DUT1 and DUT2 and DUT3 to PC.
4. Open DDM from your laptop monitor
5. Verify whether the default monitor in the DDM drop-down list is in DUT2.
Result: After opening DDM from the laptop, the DDM default monitor is still DUT1
Expectation: After opening DDM from the laptop, the DDM default monitor is DUT2

Scenario#2
1. Click the DDM icon > Menu launcher or Main menu
2. Drag DDM to DUT2
3. Reconnect DUT1 and DUT2 and DUT3(non-Dell DUT) to PC.
4.Open DDM from DUT3 (non-Dell DUT)
5. Verify whether the default monitor in the DDM drop-down list is in DUT2.
Result: After Open DDM from DUT3 (non-Dell DUT), the DDM default monitor is DUT1
Result: After Open DDM from DUT3 (non-Dell DUT), the DDM default monitor is DUT2

Scenario#3
1. Click the DDM icon > Menu launcher or Main menu
2. Drag DDM to DUT2
3. Exit and restart DDM
4. After restarting DDM, verify whether the default monitor in the DDM drop-down list is in DUT2
Result: After restarting DDM will follow the Main display(DUT1) the default monitor option in the DDM drop-down list is still at DUT1
Expectation: The default monitor in the DDM drop-down list after restarting DDM is DUT2

chinese: [DDM2.2] Export and Import of application settings should only display UI in windows notifcations
title: [DDM2.2] Export and Import of application settings should only display UI in windows notifcations
description:
All the UI for background processes should not pop up interactive UI using the DDM main screen.  Background processes should display windows notification for any messages/alert.
 

Scope:

Scrub through other areas with DDM UI pop up

Affected areas
Errors:
Extra dialog UI popup when using CLI.
Expect:
No DDM dialog popup instead of using Windows Notification when using CLI
No breaking on the UI functions

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] ddm /log c:\temp\ddm.txt /XXXX下完後，重開機再接上DUT，日誌文件沒有更新.
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] After ordering cmd "ddm /log c:\temp\ddm.txt / XXX", restart the PC and connecting to monitor,  the log file is not updated.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.34
PC model : latitude 9520
OS version : Windows10 Pro (22H2) 19045.3448
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Monitor / FW : UP2720QA / M2T101
Input Source : USB-C
description:
Setup:
1. Open command Prompt from PC. (search for ""cmd"")
2. Type following in command prompt: cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2
3. Issue command without monitor connected

1. Enter cmd ""ddm /log c:\temp\ddm.txt /CountMonitorsCI""
2. Restart PC.
3. Now connect a monitor.

Result: After ordering cmd "ddm /log c:\temp\ddm.txt / XXX", restart the PC and connecting to monitor,  the log file is not updated.
Expectation: After ordering cmd "ddm /log c:\temp\ddm.txt / XXX", restart the PC and connecting to monitor,  the log file has been updated.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] Network access對話框會被設定取消按鈕影響
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] Network access dialog box will be affected by the settings cancel button.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.34
PC1 model: ASUS-FX516PM
OS version: Windows 10 Home(22H2),19045.3570
Graphics Chipset: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 6G

Monitor1 / FW : U2422HE / M3B409
Input Source1: HDMI
description:
Setup:
1. Open "Registry Editor" 
2. Go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\DeviceAccess 
3. Double click "ActivePolicyCode", enter "zh" under value data.  
4. Click OK.

1. Install DDM with tick DDM launch. (uninstall previous DDM if have existing DDM in system).
2. Launch DDM
3. Network access click No and Go to main menu > Settings.
4. Go to Update tab, Tick "Automatically notify when update is available" and Network access click Yes. 
5. Click cancel button > Check Settings

Result: Network access dialog box will be affected by setting cancel button.
"Automatically notify when update is available" is untick.
"I give permission for Dell Display Manager to access data through network if necessary." is tick.
Expectation: Network access dialog box will not be affected by setting cancel button.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] In iMST mode, EA無法依個別螢幕所選擇
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] In iMST mode, EA cannot select according to screen partition.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.2.1.34
PC: Dell Latitude 9520
OS version: Windows 11 Pro, 22H2, 22621.2428
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Monitor/FW: U4025QW, 33T107
Input Source: C to DP
description:

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] "Auto-restore window layout"功能運作不正常

description:
1. Launch DDM
2. Right click on DDM icon in tasktray. Click on "Auto-restore window layout" to enable.
(Remember if there is window on the Monitor before enabling the feature)
3. Now move the folder to any position of the monitor.
4. Unplug the video cable and plug it back after 5 sec, observe the screen.


Result: "Auto-restore window layout" function will only record the moment it is opened.
The windows will not restore back to the layout per step 3.
Expectation: After plug back the cable, the windows should restore back to the layout per step 3.

Note:
* Single DUT and multiple DUT have the same issue.
* Desktop has same issue.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] 螢幕更新韌體成功後DDM卻提示更新韌體失敗
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] After the monitor's firmware update was successful, DDM still prompts that the firmware update failed.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.34
PC1 model : DELL Precision 7560
OS Name : Windows 10 Pro (22H2),
19045.3570
Graphics Chipset : Intel® UHD Graphics
for 11th Gen Intel® Processors
NVIDIA T1200 Laptop GPU

Monitor1 / FW : U3224KB/M2T103-M2T104
Input Source1 : Thunderbolt
description:
1. Click the DDM icon > Main menu > Settings icon > Update tab
2. Click Update button(U3224KB MT104) > Click Yes
3. Download update file > Download completed > Click Yes > Waiting for update > Update completed
4. DDM automatically refreshes after waiting for 1 minute > Refresh completed
5. Check OSD and DDM to see it has been successfully updated to M2T104
6. OSD and DDM have determined the current firmware M2T104
7. DDM notification show firmware update failed in OS notification bar.

Result: After the monitor firmware is updated, the OS notification bar DDM prompts that the firmware update failed
Expectation: After updating the monitor firmware, the OS notification bar DDM should prompt that the firmware has been successfully updated to M2T104

U4021QW/M2T105 has the same issue.
U3219Q/M3B111 has the same issue.
U3421WE/M2B107 No issue
DDM 2.2.0.43 No issue

Attached are the ISP log and DDM log files.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] 時間經過24小時之後DDM沒有再通知螢幕韌體更新通知
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] DDM no longer notifies the DUT firmware update notification after 24 hours.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.34
PC1 model : DELL Precision 7560
OS Name : Windows 10 Pro (22H2),
19045.3570
Graphics Chipset : Intel® UHD Graphics
for 11th Gen Intel® Processors
NVIDIA T1200 Laptop GPU

Monitor1 / FW : P2422HE/M2B206-M2B207
Input Source1 : DP

Monitor2 / FW :C2423H/M3B102-M3B103
Input Source1 : HDMI
description:
Firmware update using CLI #16
1. Enable DDM to execute in the background.
2. Open CMD in OS.
3. Enter the "cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2" command in CMD and then enter the "ddm /fwupdate defer" command.
4. Plug in the monitor that HAVE FW update available Please make sure USB upstream cable is connected.
5. The notification bar DDM of the operating system notifies that this DUT has new firmware, "Right now" and "Remind Later".
6. Go to Control Panel and set the time to 24 hours later.
7. Verify that the notification bar DDM of the operating system once again notifies the DUT that there is new firmware, "Right now" and "Remind Later".

Firmware update using CLI #17
1. Enable DDM to execute in the background.
2. Open CMD in OS.
3. Enter the "cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2" command in CMD and then enter the "ddm /fwupdate defer" command.
4. Plug in the monitor that HAVE FW update available.
5. The notification bar DDM of the operating system notifies that this DUT has new firmware, "Right now" and "Remind Later".
6. Unplug monitor.
7. Connect another DUT that HAVE FW update available. Please make sure USB upstream cable is connected.
8. Go to Control Panel and set the time to 24 hours later.
9. Verify whether the OS's DDM notification will notify again new update to the firmware of this DUT, "Right now" and "Remind Later".

Result: After the time was adjusted to 24 hours, the notification bar DDM of the operating system did not notify the DUT that there was new firmware again, "Right now" and "Remind Later"
Expectation:The time is adjusted to 24 hours, and the operating system's notification bar DDM will notify the DUT that there is new firmware again, "Right now" and "Remind Later"

title: Calculate Easy Arrange Windows Layout depends on Windows Taskbar
description:
User Story:

As a DDM EA user, I have one or more DELL monitors and my Windows Taskbar location and behavior are customized.
When I pull an application to an EA layout, the app windows can be calculated correctly.
So that my App windows won't cover or be covered by the Taskbar.

Accept Criteria:

The layout position and size should correspond to the Taskbar location. No matter the Taskbar is on the Bottom, Right, Top, or Left.
The layout position and size should correspond to the Taskbar hide mode on different display(s). No matter the Taskbar is hide/show or showed on certain display(s).
The layout position and size should correspond to the Taskbar other configurations (e.g. small buttons) which could impact the available Windows layout.
The app Window position and size should be correct when user release the mouse.
It is good to recalculate all applications layout and size if user change the corresponding Taskbar configuration. (Option)

title: Optimize schedule function when monitor in limit SW mode
description:
If monitor in limited SW mode, stop schedule timer.

Reset schedule timer back when monitor back to normal mode.

system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.39
PC1 model: ASUS-FX516PM

Input Source 2 : Thunderbolt
description:
1. Launch DDM.
2. Open Software > Main Menu > KVM > Network KVM > proceed until completion.
3. Click DDM other Tab or use DDM function.

Result: DDM delay when clicked. (or PC lag )
 1. When switching tabs to import the page
 2. Click kvm settings link
 3. Click the Reposition Screens link
 4. Use switch pc hotkey whether it is full screen or pbp
 5. When the connection is restored
 6. Click finish when setting is complete
Expectation: Should not cause DDM or PC to lag.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] 鍵盤滑鼠連接DUT時，使用"Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer." 熱鍵後, 滑鼠行為不正確(2PBP-4PBP)
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] Mouse behaves incorrectly after using "Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer." hotkey.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.39
PC1 model: ASUS-FX516PM
OS version: Windows 10 Home(22H2),19045.3693
Graphics Chipset: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 6G
PC2 model : Dell Latitude 9520
OS version : Windows11 Pro (22H2) 22621.2715
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor / FW : U2722DE / M3T107
Input Source 1 : C
Input Source 2 : HDMI
description:
Setup A: 
a) DUT supports PBP.
b) One DUT connects to 2 PCs through different input port.
c) All PCs connected to same network.

Setup B: 
a) DUT1 connect to PC1.
b) DUT2 connect to PC2.     
c) All PCs connected to same network.

1. Keyboard and Mouse connected to monitor,
2. Launch DDM
3. Open Software > Main Menu > KVM > Network KVM > proceed until completion > add PC2
4. KVM Settings > Hotkeys page > Set "Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer." hotkey
5. Use "Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer." hotkey on: 
(1)  PC1/PC2 Keyboard
(2) External Keyboard connected to PC1/PC2
(3) With mouse cursor on PC1/PC2 screen. External keyboard connected to DUT.


Result: Each PC must be connected to USB upstream before hotkeys can be used.
In extended mode, mouse will return to DUT screen.
When the number of USB stream is less than the number of input ports, hotkeys will not work properly.
In PBP mode, the mouse will only return to the same PC, and swapping screens is same. (Setup A)
Expectation: The current mouse should be back to current PC screen.


Epic Link : MDDM-731
Dependencies : 
Linked Issues = Discovered while testing
Issue = MDDM-2522

chinese: [DDM Win 2.2.1] Administrator user的情況下，輸入DDM /Lockupdate，回覆" Exit Code 1:The application command (Lockupdate) must run in administrator mode."
title: [DDM Win 2.2.1] In the case of Administrator user, Command Line have different behavior.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.2.1.39
PC model : latitude 9520
OS version : Windows10 Pro (22H2) 19045.3448
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Monitor / FW : C2423H / M3B103
Input Source : HDMI
description:
Setup:
1. Run this with Administrator user.

Situation one:
1. Open DDM and CMD.
2. Enter DDM /Console start.
3. Enter DDM /Lockupdate.
4. Check the reply.

Result: Reply to "Exit Code 1:The application command (Lockupdate) must run in administrator mode."
Expectation: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute.

Situation 2:
1. Open CMD and use Admin to open DDM.
2. Enter DDM /Console start.
3. Enter DDM /Lockupdate.
4. Check the reply.

Result: Reply to "Exit Code 1:The application command (Lockupdate) must run in administrator mode."
Expectation: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute.

Situation three:
1. Open DDM and use Admin to open CMD.
2. Enter DDM /Console start.
3. Enter DDM /Lockupdate.
4. Check the reply.

Result: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute
Expectation: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute.

Situation four:
1. Use Admin to open DDM and CMD.
2. Enter DDM /Console start.
3. Enter DDM /Lockupdate.
4. Check the reply.

Result: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute.
Expectation: Reply Lockupdate = Ok and execute.

Note: The following instructions all have these problems.
Ex: DDM /Noupdate On(Off)
DDM /Lockupdate(Unlockupdate)
DDM /Telemetry On(Off)
DDM /Telemetry disable(enable)

title: P2725HEt Wistron-P3: USB-C Prioritization DDM command error
description:
P2725HE FW:33T104
Input:USB-C&DP&HDMI
EQ:DELL XPS 9720
DDMv2.2.1.39
FPD - Remote Access - DDM Command Line Interface
#284&285&286

test steps:
1. Type the command "DDM /1:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighResolution" on HBR2 source.
2. Type the command "DDM /1:ReadUsbCPrioritization" on HBR2 source.
3. Type the command "DDM /2:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighDataSpeed" on HBR3 source.
4. Type the command "DDM /2:ReadUsbCPrioritization" on HBR3 source.
5. Type the command "DDM /1:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighResolution /2:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighResolution" when HBR2 source directly connect DU1 and DUT2.
6. Type the command "DDM /1:ReadUsbCPrioritization /2:ReadUsbCPrioritization" when HBR2 source directly connect DU1 and DUT2.
7. Type the command "DDM /1:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighDataSpeed /2:WriteUsbCPrioritization HighDataSpeed" when HBR3 source directly connect DU1 and DUT2.
8. Type the command "DDM /1:ReadUsbCPrioritization /2:ReadUsbCPrioritization" when HBR3 source directly connect DU1 and DUT2.

Result:
1) Type the Write command, DUT go in to Power Save Mode, then Plug and Unplug cable, DDM is in Limit mode.
2) Type the Read command, the replied information is Error.

case requires:
1) Type the Write command, DUT should display normally and DDM should be in Full mode.
2) Type the Read command, the replied information can't be Error and they should be as case required.

chinese: [DDM Win 2.3]勾選"Automatically apply the settings when the same model is detected"後，插入到新顯示器不會顯示導入的訊息詢問YES or NO

system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.0.2

Input Source: USB-C
description:
scence 1: 
1. Launch DDM.
2. Open software > Main menu > Others 
3. Tick "Automatically apply the settings when the same model is detected".
4. Others > Application Settings. >Click Export.
5. When DDM/DDPM UI is opened.
6. Connect another same model monitor(DUT2) but different service tag.
7. Message is displayed in windows notification, NOT DDM/DDPM message box.
8. Message C step 1 is displayed.

scence 2:
1. Launch DDM.
2. Open software > Main menu > Others 
3. Tick "Automatically apply the settings when the same model is detected".
4. Others > Application Settings. > Click Export.
5. When DDM/DDPM running in background.
6. Unplug current connected monitor and connect another same model monitor(DUT2) but different service tag. 
7. Message is displayed in windows notification, NOT DDM/DDPM message box.
8. Message C step 1 is displayed.

Result: When plugging in a new monitor, the imported message will not ask "Yes" or "No" and will be imported directly into the monitor.
Expectation: When plugging in a new monitor, an imported message should be appear asking for Yes or No.

description:

chinese: [DDM Win 2.3] 在schedule開始前，電腦進入睡眠模式，schedule開始後喚醒電腦，亮度不會直接套用設定的值

system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.0.2
PC: Dell Latitude 9520
OS version: Windows10 Pro (22H2) 19045.3758
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

description:
1. Main Menu > Brightness/Contrast > Schedule
2. Turn on Schedule Brightness/Contrast.
3. On schedule tab, go to Settings. Change the settings for Time, Duration of pre-transition 
4. The current time falls within 'Day' preset. 
5. Before the 'Night' preset starts, put PC in sleep mode while Schedule Brightness/Contrast remains ON.
6. Wake up PC after the 'Night' preset timing starts. 
7. Observe the screen Brightness/Contrast, OSD and schedule tab.

Result: When the schedule starts and the computer wakes up, the Brightness/Contrast will not directly apply the set value.
Expectation:The brightness/contrast values ​​of the screen and OSD will straight apply to the 'Night' preset targeted Brightness/Contrast value without any transition.

Epic Link : MDDM-4006
Dependencies : 
Linked Issues = Discovered while testing
Issue = MDDM-4059, MDDM-4277

Result: After installing DDM using CLI, Network KVM has not been configured.

3. ddmsetup.exe /verysilent /Installfeature=NetworkKVM /NetworkKVM=off /networkkvmincomingport = /networkkvmoutgoingport= /networkkvmcontenttransferport = /NetworkKVMContentTransfer=disabled /NetworkKVMAutoConnect=disabled

chinese: [DDM Win2.3] mouse can't move between two PBP windows
title: [DDM Win 2.3] Mouse can't move between two PBP windows
system_information:
DDM version : 2.3.0.2
PC1 model : Dell Inspiron 7300 2n1
OS Name : Windows 11 Pro (22H2), 22621.2715
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R)UHD Graphics

Input Source 2: HDMI1 + USB-C2(upstream) for PC2
description:
1. PC1 connect DUT with USB-C cable.
2. PC2 connect DUT with HDMI&USB-C cable.
3. Set up USB upstream for both through KVM setting. 
4. Connect mouse and keyboard to DUT USB at the side.
5. DDM Software > Main Menu >KVM>Hotkey>enable Automatically allow mouse to move between two PBP windows.
6. On HDMI signal,Move mouse cursor to the center of the physical screen and beyond and stay for awhile.
7. On USB-C signal, Mouve mouse cursor to the center of the physical screen and beyond and stay for awhile.
8. Swap the input source (USB-C to PC2, HDMI+USB-C2 to PC1) then perform step6, step7 anain

Result: Mouse cannot move to another PBP window.
Expectation: Mouse and keyboard can move between two PBP windows normally.

chinese: [DDM2.1]鍵盤使用後被劫持
title: [DDM2.1] Keyboard is hijacked after the use
description:
Steps to reproduce

1.Setup 2 PCs with multiple monitors configuration
2.1 windows 10 PC is connected one monitor U2722DE and the other PC, Windows 11 is connected with U2722D
 

Observation

1.User is able to move around the 2 PCs initially
2.Once the PC on windows 11 is locked, user can reconnect the PC using the main menu
3.After a couple of times of moving between the 2 PCs, user is unable to type on Windows 10 PC
4.Typing K resulted in opening other menu, typing any other letters have no response on the notepad.' (The mouse is working when this problem happens)
5.Exit DDM from both PCs does not help to recover the keyboard function
6.Pressing the 'Alt' / 'Ctrl' seems to help to escape and able to recover the keyboard.
7.After using for a while, the mouse appears to be lag.  See the attached log around 2:28p.m and  DDM crashed after that and the mouse speed restored.

[In release 3, DDM did not crash but the keyboard rendered to no use because unable to type. To force the keyboard to restore, disconnect the PC from Windows 11, kill the process in windows 10]  

After doing so, the keyboard took a long while before restoring its function. Upon reconnect, user receives a PIN prompt but there is no PIN available on another PC.  Hence it is unable to reestablish the connection, not until running the entire setup all over again.  It is also interesting to see both the PIN and PIN entered dialog showing up on the windows 10 PC.

 

Expected Results

1.User is able to use the keyboard and mouse reliability with or without Network KVM turned on/disconnected
2.User should be able to use the mouse without lag.
3.Reconnect should be able to establish connection successfully and not prompt user for PIN.  It should not default to NONE cluster to avoid user from creating a new cluster again.

(b) Switching between multiple displays and single display (mouse could not move out of the source PC)


Observation

Mouse and keyboard will disappear from the active PC
Expected results

1. The mouse and keyboard should be usable on active PC

DDM2: Easy Arrange - Application Window Snap
system_information:
Acceptance Criteria:
GIVEN: DDM is running
AND: At least one external monitor is connected
WHEN: user moves the app window
THEN: AWS band appears near the cursor, with equal distance left/right of the cursor
WHEN: user drag the app window to the screen or zone
THEN: DDM highlights the area when mouse over
WHEN: user releases the mouse button
THEN: DDM snap the app to the selected screen or zone.
description:
As a user, I want to move my App window to any of the screens and snap to the layout so that I can arrange my viewing windows quickly.

1.When user moves the app window, auto show the multiple display with relative positions as shown in the OS display settings, together with the the EA with MRU patterns of the selected display (a.k.a App Window Snap Band, AWS band)
2.After AWS band appears on screen, it stays static to allow user to snap to the screen or MRU zone.
3.The snap window should be presented closer to mouse location, and mouse movement to select the screen and the last zone should be equal distance from both ends.

title: DDM2: Easy Arrange - [Windows] Include Win 11 layout in MRU
description:
DDM shall track MRU EA patterns for each display. .

Provide an option for user to add Windows 11 snap layout used as one of the MRU in DDM. .

For recently used layout, it should only show once regardless of how many times user clicks for a given layout.

It should display up to 5 latest used Easy Arrange Layout.  This recently used layout will appear on DDM 2.0 main menu and DDM2.0 menu launcher.

title: Allow Easy Arrangement support when iMST enable
description:
User Story:

As a user I have U4025QW display with iMST enabled,

I would like to use different Easy Arrangement (EA) layouts when enabled iMST,

So that I can have the flexibility to configure my applications layout on the large monitor.

 

Accept Criteria:

User can setup different EA layout on different monitor area when enabled iMST
User can setup different Easy Memory (EAM) on different monitor area when enabled iMST
USB KVM cannot access when iMST enabled
User can use EA/EAM/USB KVM normally when iMST disabled.
Network KVM can still function normally.
No side effect on other iMST or standard monitors
 

Limitation:

EA/EAM layout won't need to be consistent when iMST enabled/disabled.
EA/EAM layout won't need to be consistent when iMST enabled and input sources are different.

title: Optimize B/C & ALS gray-out behavior when coexisting with Smart HDR
description:
User Story:

Scenario - 1

As a U4025QW user,

I would like to disable and gray out ALS or B/C settings automatically whenever enable the Smart HDR.

So that I won't get unexpected brightness or color temp when using Smart HDR.

 

Scenarios - 2

As a U4025QW user,

I would like to reverse ALS or B/C settings back automatically whenever disabled the Smart HDR.

So that I could have expected brightness, contrast, or color temp when turn Smart HDR off and control the B/C settings manually or scheduled.

 

Scenario - 3

As a Smart HDR monitor user,

I would like to disable and gray out manual and scheduled B/C settings automatically whenever enable the Smart HDR.

So that I won't get unexpected brightness or color temp when using Smart HDR.

 

Scenarios - 4

As a Smart HDR user,

I would like to reverse manual and schedule B/C settings back automatically whenever disabled the Smart HDR.

So that I could have expected brightness, contrast, or color temp when turn Smart HDR off and control the B/C settings manually or scheduled.

 

Accept Criteria:

A mouse hover over message on the grayed-out B/C (Main/Launch) menu when the HDR enabled. (Ref. Similar to EA mode)
Message: "Brightness / Contrast is not available in HDR mode."
No mouse hover over message need when the Smart HDR is disabled and B/C menu back for use.
B/C (Main/Launch) menu grayed out when Smart HD is enabled.
B/C (Main/Launch) menu becomes available when Smart HD is disabled.
For ALS & HDR monitors
ALS & HDR settings should sync with OSD when the HDR enabled & disabled.
Manual B/C and ALS settings should be off and no-effect when Smart HDR enabled.
User cannot set B/C CLI settings as same as UI.
Manual B/C and ALS settings should be granted and run as expected when Smart HDR disabled,
User can set B/C CLI settings as same as UI
For regular B/C & HDR monitors
B/C & HDR settings should sync with OSD when the HDR enabled & disabled.
Manual B/C and schedule settings should be off and no-effect when Smart HDR enabled.
User cannot set B/C CLI settings as same as UI.
Manual B/C and schedule settings should be granted and run as expected when Smart HDR disabled,
User can set B/C CLI settings as same as UI
No errors or crashes when using Smart HDR on other monitors (w/ ALS; w/o ALS)
No errors or crashes when using ALS or schedules settings on other monitors (w/ HDR; w/o HDR)
Attachments

title: [DDM 2.3] Allow content transfer still tick in UI even it's untick during DDM installation

title: [DDM Win 2.3] Connecting ALS and non-ALS combinations, the non-ALS monitor color preset is changed, the ALS monitor color presets for the DDM icon will be synchronized.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.0.4
PC1 model: XPS 8940
OS version: Windows 11 Pro(22H2)22621.2861

description:
test case: Synchronize between monitors Step26-3&30-4
1.Setup:
 a)  Direct Connect 1or 2  ALS monitor and 2 non ALS monitors
 b) U2724D &U2724D is monitor with ALS function.
 c) SE2324DS and E2423H are monitors without ALS function.
2. Open Software > Main Menu. 
3. Turn on ALS Function on U2724D(Turn On Auto Brightness/Auto Color Temperature.)
4. Enable "Synchronize between monitors" on SE2324DS and E2423H
5. Change color preset in SE2324DS and E2423H(ex:standard、custom color)
6. Preset mode changes will apply to both SE2324DS and E2423H and OSD. No changes on U2724D &U2724D.
7. Check DDM、OSD、DDM icon.

Result: When ALS function is enabled from any ALS monitor, and "Synchronize between monitors" is turned on on any non-ALS monitor, the non-ALS monitor color preset is changed, the ALS monitor color presets for the DDM icon will be synchronized.
Expectation: The DDM icon of the ALS monitors should not be synchronized.

Dependencies : 
Linked Issues = Discovered while testing
Issue = MDDM-886, MDDM-986, MDDM-1032, MDDM-2501

scence 1: 
1. When DDM/DDPM UI is opened.
2. Connect another same model monitorbut different service tag.

5. The displayed message is the same as step 3

Result: re-plug and unplug the screen, and the import message will not be displayed again.
Expectation: re-plug and unplug the screen, and the import message should be displayed again.

system_information:
DDM version : 2.3.0.7

OS version: Windows 10 Home(22H2),19045.3803
Graphics Chipset: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 6G

description:
test case: Network KVM Installation Step23-11
1. No DDM/DDPM installed.
2. Enter cd command to DDM/DDPM unzip folder.
Windows: cd c:\[folder name]
3. Type following command to install DDM/DDPM by launching the .exe file:
ddmsetup.exe /verysilent /Installfeature=NetworkKVM /NetworkKVM=on /networkkvmincomingport=5567
4.  After installation, Open the command prompt(Windows) / Terminal (MacOS). Type "netstat -a" (Windows) check 5567.
5. Launch the Software UI to setup network KVM then go to KVM settings > Network.
6.  Uninstall the software and repeat step 3 to 5 with following duplicate values.
(a) 5566 (b) 5568

Result: Able to find not 5567 the port in the list in command prompt.
Port=5566 , network port is greyed out and affect outgoing ports.
Port=5568 , network KVM is disabled.
Expectation: Able to find 5567 the port in the list in command prompt.
Incoming port should be 5567 default value due to invalid/duplicate value entered.

title: [DDM2.2] Unable to auto connect Single Display monitors
description:
Steps to reproduce

All these issues are detected from 1120PM onwards (refer to Win_DDM_v2.2.0.11_windows10.zip and Win_DDM_v2.2.0.11_windows11.zip)

1.Connect PC1(windows 10)  with 2 monitors via DP and HDMI
2.Connect PC2 (windows 11) with 1 monitors via USB
3.Run network KVM setup wizard on PC2 and select ‘Single Display’
4.NetworkKVM attempted to auto connect but failed
5.User attempted to enter IP address and received error “Client is connected to different monitor”
6.User disconnect one of the monitor from PC1 and continue the Single Display Setup
7.The same error persists and unable to setup as Single Display configuration
8.Unable to connect if one of the PC is externally connected to another PC
9.Exit DDM and relaunch DDM
10.Only then the auto connect works
11.After user attempted to download files from internet, the connection is disconnected (around 1230am, refer to DDM_NetworkKVM_20230505_windows11.zip and DDM_NetworkKVM_20230505_windows10.zip)
12.It is unable to reconnect and the PC disappears from the DDM UI (is this because cluster information is not saved?)
13.Attempt to 'Add PC' but able to add but connection remains disconnected
14.The UI also appears weird to have only the newly added PC disconnected but the PC icon disappears.
15.The connection can only restore after DDM exits and relaunches
到PIMS看圖片
Other UI Issues

1.The cancel button is not in the correct color contrast compared to other components.  Please scrub through network KVM UI to align with other DDM UI.  This correct color contrast should be 
到PIMS看圖片
2. DDM UI is unable to move when ‘Enter IP’ screen is popped up.  Also noticed when the UI is on this screen, when a user attempts to connect from another PC, the PIN pops up and is unable to pop up too.

chinese: [DDM 2.3] Cluster does not resume after goes to Cluster=none and return back
title: [DDM 2.3] Cluster does not resume after goes to Cluster=none and return back
description:
Setup:

PC1(Windows) connects to Monitor1

PC2(Windows) connects to Monitor2

 

    1.Setup Network KVM and add PC2 into the cluster. (Multiple Display).
    2.Able to control between PCs.
    3.Now change the cluster = None.
    4.Change back to previously cluster connected between PC1 and PC2.
 

Observation : Resume Cluster message is displayed while waiting then disappear. But Cluster does not resume at all.

Workaround: Click on connect icon to reconnect and it works.

description:
# PC connects to DUT via HDMI

Scenes #1: 

# OSD HDR is OFF

1. Open software > main menu >  Color > Advanced > Select "Automatically adjust the color preset based on ICC profile". 
2. Go to Color management > select monitor. Choose HDR icc profile.

Actual Outcome : nothing happened.
Expect Outcome : A system notification is displayed. "The default ICC profile is for Smart HDR. We are not able to change the color preset in the [model name]."

Scenes #2: 

# OSD HDR = ON and PC HDR = OFF

1. Open software > main menu >  Color > Advanced > Select "Automatically adjust the color preset based on ICC profile". 
2. Go to Color management > select monitor. Choose HDR icc profile.

Actual Outcome : nothing happened.
Expect Outcome : A system notification is displayed. "The default ICC profile is for Smart HDR. We are not able to change the color preset in the [model name]."

Scenes #3: 

# OSD HDR = ON and PC HDR = ON

1. Open software > main menu >  Color > Advanced > Select "Automatically adjust the color preset based on ICC profile". 
2. Go to Color management > select monitor. Choose Non HDR icc profile.

Actual Outcome : nothing happened.
Expect Outcome : A system notification is displayed. "The default ICC profile is for Smart HDR. We are not able to change the color preset in the [model name]."

title: [DDM2.1] Clusters Display Issues
description:
Steps to reproduce

    1.Setup one cluster
    2.One of the PC is disconnected, the PC becomes grays out (because the network KVM is turned off)
    3.When user reconnects the PC after the other PC turned on the network KVM
 
Observation (Unexpected behaviors)

    1.A new cluster is created instead (Expected Results: It should remain in the same cluster)
    2.Also noticed that the deleted cluster delays update on the UI
    3.Reconnecting one of the PCs, the deleted clusters re-appears
    4.Should not default to None but remain on the last clusters
    5.Resume cluster progress is not showing
    6.Not showing the port on the display

description:
test case : Smoke Testing Step 16-1
 PowerNap Setup:
 1. Software > Others > PowerNap > Configure, set screensaver to 1 min.
 2. Set "Brightness/Contrast" / "Luminance"  shortcut key in OSD. 
 
 Setup 1 :
 1. Open Software > Main Menu > Other > PowerNap
 2. Enable PowerNap option and select "Reduce brightness when screensaver activates"
 3. Wait for 1 min, DUT will go to screen saver
 4. Verify DUT brightness will dim
 
 Result: DUT brightness will NOT dim down.

 Setup 2 :

 2. Enable PowerNap option and select "Put the display to sleep when screensaver activates"

 4. Verify DUT goes sleep.
 
 Result: DUT not goes sleep.
 Expectation: DUT goes sleep.

chinese: [DDM 2.4] - Release5 : Network KVM的Hotkeys會因為與其他Hotkey相同，造成Hotkeys不同步.
title: [DDM 2.4] - Release5 : If Network KVM set hotkey that occupied among all remote PCs, which will cause out of sync.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.4.0.12
PC model : HP-Elite-Dragonfly G2
OS version : Windows10 Pro (22H2) 19045.3930
Graphics Chipset : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Input Source : HDMI
Input Source : C
description:
1.Setup NetworkKVM with 2 PCs
2. On PC1, for Launch main menu, set hotkey"Ctrl+z"
3. On PC2, for Launch main menu, set hotkey"Ctrl+x"

4. On PC1, for Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer, set hotkey "Ctrl+x"
=>Check on PC2, a notification about hotkey occupied by local PC shown, so this hotkey shows "None"
5. On PC2, for Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer, set hotkey "Ctrl+z"
=>Check on PC1,a notification about hotkey occupied by local PC shown, so this hotkey keeps "Ctrl+x"

Result: For those 2 PCs, the "Restore the mouse cursor to a local computer" hotkey is out of sync
On PC1,the hotkey is showing "Ctrl+x"
On PC2,the hotkey is showing "Ctrl+z"

Expectation: If the hotkey want to set is occupied among all PCs, it does not allow be set.

chinese: [DDM 2.4] - Release5 :使用"Easy Memory"且開啟Span功能並應用在DUT1，當PC restart後，layout 將不會維持在span across multiple monitors狀態
title: [DDM 2.4] - Release5 :The "Easy Memory" layout will not remain in the span across multiple monitors state after the PC restart.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.4.0.12
 PC model: Thena QC 14 - Latitude 7455
(BIOS v0.3.4, 2/15/2024)
 OS version: PostCS13_Win11 Pro (24H2 , 26058.1100)
 Graphics Chipset: Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) GPU

 Monitor1 / FW: P2425HE / M3B101
 Input Source: USB-C
description:
Test case : Easy Memory Step 78-7 79-7
Scenario 1 :
Connection:
a) DUT1 connects to PC1.
b) DUT2 connects to PC1.  
c) DUT1 & DUT2 must be same screen size. 
d) In PC settings, Both monitor
   Set to side by side.
   Set to same resolution.
   Set to same % in ""Change the size of text, apps, and other items""
   in extended mode and in landscape position.
1. Select one predefined layout for each DUT and observe the screen. 
2. Go to Easy Arrange > Settings > Span across multiple monitors.
3. Enable ""Span across multiple monitors"".
4. Create easy memory profile with ""Enable ""Launch during PC startup"" for DUT1 and DUT2. 
5. Select DUT1 and apply easy memory layout.
6. Exit DDM and launch DDM. Drag the file and check the layout.
7. Restart PC. Check easy memory launch.

Scenario 2 :
Connection:
a) DUT1 connects to PC1.
b) DUT2 connects to PC1.  
c) DUT1 & DUT2 must be same screen size. 
d) In PC settings, Both monitor
   Set to side by side.
   Set to same resolution.
   Set to same % in ""Change the size of text, apps, and other items""
   in extended mode and in portrait position.
1. Select one predefined layout for each DUT and observe the screen.  
2. Go to Easy Arrange > Settings > Span across multiple monitors.
3. Enable ""Span across multiple monitors"".
4. Create easy memory profile with ""Enable ""Launch during PC startup"" for DUT1 and DUT2. 
5. Select DUT1 and apply easy memory layout.
6. Exit DDM and launch DDM. Drag the file and check the layout.
7. Restart PC. Check easy memory launch.

Result: "Easy Memory" layout will not remain in the span across multiple monitors state after the PC restart.
Expectation: "Easy Memory" layout will remain in the span across multiple monitors state after the PC restart."

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release6 : 切換 DUT 後在使用 Hotkey 調整 Brightness - , Brightness 的值會顯示一開始設定的值
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release6 : Use the hotkeys adjusting the brightness -, the value will show the value set at the beginning.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.1
PC model : Alienware M16 R1 Infinity 16 RPL-NB598
OS version : Windows 11Pro (24H2) , 26058.1400
Graphics Chipset : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 Laptop GPU


Monitor1 / FW: U2424HE / M3B101
Input Source : HDMI
Monitor2 / FW: P2725H / 32B115
Input Source : DP
description:
Testcase : Hotkeys#32 step9~10
1. DUT1 &  DUT2 connects to PC1.
2. Open Software > Main Menu icon > Click Brightness/Contrast > Hotkeys > Brightness -
3. Change valid hotkey for DUT1.
4. Software selected on DUT2. Move the mouse to Notebook screen. Use the Brightness - hotkey.
5. Software selected on DUT1. Move the mouse to Notebook screen. Use the Brightness - hotkey.
6. Repeat step 4-5 for 5 times

Result : After switching the DUT and use the hotkeys adjusting the brightness -, the brightness value is shown as the value set at the beginning. (Probability: 3/5)
Expectation: The brightness value should show the value after setting.

Note : 
This issue will occur for the following hotkeys
1. Brightness + , Brightness -

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1 - Release6 : 使用MST連接 DUT1與DUT2時，DDM會將DUT2的螢幕FW讀取錯誤(same model)
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release6 : On MST connection with same model, DUT2 FW information is incorrect on DDM's "Update" tab
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.1
 PC model: Thena QC 14 - Latitude 7455
(BIOS v0.3.4, 2/15/2024)
 OS version: PostCS13_Win11 Pro (24H2 , 26058.1100)
 Graphics Chipset: Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) GPU

 Monitor1 / FW: C2423H / M3B108
Input Source: C to DP cable

 Monitor2 / FW: C2423H / M3B108
 Input Source: DP to DP cable
description:
Test case : Monitor Firmware Update Step 13-1
1.
Two monitors are same model.
PC -- [USB upstream cable] -- DUT1. 
DUT1 -- [USB upstream cable] -- DUT2. 
DUT1(C2423H_M3B104) HAVE FW update available.
DUT2(C2423H_M3B108) DONT HAVE FW update available.

2. Open Software > Main menu > Settings icon > Update tab. 
3. Check DUT1 and DUT2 firmware version.

Result: DUT2 FW information is incorrect(show M3B104).
Expectation: DUT2 FW information should be correct(show M3B108).

Note1: Dell 7300 2in1(Intel) is not same issue
Note2: DUT1(C2423H_M3B108) and DUT2(C2423H_M3B104) is the same issue
Note3: Firmware update using CLI is same issue.
-ddm /fwupdate defer
-ddm /fwupdate force
Note4: In "?" icon is the same issue (DUT1_M3B104/DUT2_M3B104)

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 7 : 有勾選Launch during PC startup下並Restart PC後 ,Easy memory profile 無啟用
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 7 : After tick ''Launch during PC startup'', Easy memory profile is not launch app/documents when restart PC.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.2
PC model : ASUS UX435EG
OS version : Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (19045.4123)
Graphics Chipset :  Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor1 / FW: U2424HE / M3B101
Input Source : HDMI
description:
Testcase : Easy Memory#23 step5
1. Connect DUT to PC.
2. Open software > main menu > Settings, tick "Auto-load at startup".
3. Open software > main menu > Easy Arrange > Easy Memory. Click + to create.
4. Enter a name and select one layout. 
5. Assign Application/Documents to all Windows
6. Click next until launch option.
7. Tick "Launch during PC startup". Check the message displayed.
8. Click Finish. Check the Profile info.
9. Restart PC. 

Result : After tick ''Launch during PC startup '' and Restart PC , Easy memory profile is not launch app/document  
Expectation : Easy memory profile is launch after PC startup with correct app/document in each window with selected layout.

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 7 :PC1 DDM上的Brightness/Contrast顯示與OSD選單不一致

system_information:
DDM version : 2.3.1.2

PC1 model : Dell-Precision 3560

Monitor1/FW : Alienware AW3225QF / FW : M2B103
Input Source : 
1. HDMI (Connect to Dell-Precision 3560)
2. DP (Connect to Dell-Precision 7320)
description:
Test case : PIP & PBP #22, #23 Step6
1. DUT connects to PC1(main) and PC2(sub).
2. Change to PBP mode in OSD
3. PC1 NOT in HDR or DV mode.
4. PC2 in Smart HDR or DV mode.
5. Check Brightness and Contrast in Software and OSD.
 
Result: Brightness and Contrast display on PC1 DDM (Main) is inconsistent with OSD
            1. Brightness and Contrastis is enabled in Software (PC1 Main) , Brightness and Contrastis  is  grayed out in OSD
            2. PC1 Software : Brightness/Contrast - Not greyed out
            PC2 Software : Brightness/Contrast - Greyed out
            OSD :  Brightness/Contrast - Greyed out
Expectation: Brightness and Contrast is enabled in OSD, Brightness and Contrast should be enabled in Software.

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 7 :2台UP+1台非UP，UP同步，滑鼠在UP上，DDM在非UP上，用hotkey調整亮度對比，UP的亮度不會同步
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 7 :  Connecting UP and non-UP and enable synchronize, using hotkeys to adjust the B/C, the brightness of UP will not be synchronized.
system_information:
DDM version : 2.3.1.2
PC1 model: XPS 8940
OS version: Windows 11 Pro(23H2)22631.3235
Graphics Chipset: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 

Monitor1 / FW: UP2720Q / M2B107
Input Source: DP
Monitor2 / FW: UP2720QA / M2B101
Input Source: DP
Monitor3 / FW: S2725HS / 33T106
Input Source: HDMI
description:
Setup:
 a) Direct Connect 2 UP monitor and 1 non UP monitors
 b) S2725HS is monitor with non UP function.
 c) UP2720Q and UP2720QA are monitors without UP function.
1. Open Software > Main Menu. 
2. Enable "Synchronize between monitors" on UP
3. Luminance > hotkey > Setup Luminance+/- hotkey.
4.Mouse is on UP2720Q
    DDM is on UP2720Q
    DDM drop-down menu is on S2725HS
5. use Luminance hotkey.
6. check  Luminance value 

Result: Use hotkeys to adjust the Luminance. The Luminance of UP will not be synchronized.
Expectation: Use hotkeys to adjust the Luminance. The Luminance of UP will be synchronized.
Note: Connect 1 UP monitor and 2 non UP monitors have smae issue.

Result: IP address will not be updated.
Expectation: IP address will be updated.

   Right click on Desktop, and select Display Settings, switch "HDR & WCG" to on. 
2. Right click on Desktop, and select Display Settings, switch "HDR & WCG" to off.

1.
Two monitors are different model.
PC TBT port {TBT cable} DUT1 TBT video port {USB-C/TBT cable} DUT2 TBT video port.
DUT1(U3224KB_M2T104) HAVE FW update available.
DUT2(U4021QW_M2T105) DONT HAVE FW update available.

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1 ] - Release 8 : 等待Easy memory profile 自動開啟後,透過 Media Player & Movies & TV Player 開啟的video file 未在正確的Layout上開啟
title: [DDM 2.3.1 ] - Release 8 : Video files opened through Media Player and Movies & TV Player is not opened in the correct layout.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.3
PC model : ASUS UX435EG
OS version : Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (19045.4123)
Graphics Chipset :  Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor1 / FW: U2424HE / M3B101
Input Source : HDMI
description:
Testcase : Easy Memory#28 step1~4
1. Connect DUT to PC.
2. Open software > main menu > Settings, tick "Auto-load at startup".
3. Open software > main menu > Easy Arrange > Easy Memory. Create a profile with following:
      - 12 windows pre-defined layout
      - Assign the app to each windows.
          Window1 : Outlook App
          Window2 : .vsdx file 1 (Microsoft Visio files)
          Window3 : .vsdx file 2 (Microsoft Visio files)
          Window4 : .mp4 video file (open with Media Player)
          Window5 : .mov video file (open with VLC Media Player)
          Window6 : .wmv video file (open with Windows Media Player)
          Window7 : .avi video file (open with Movies & TV Player)
          Window8 : .tiff (picture file)
          Window9 : .bmp (picture file)
          Window10 : .gif (picture file)
          Window11 : .raw (picture file) 
          Window12 : .jpeg (picture file) 
      - Select "Automatically Launch by Time"
      - Launch during PC start = tick.
4. Select this profile and apply. Check the monitor screen.
5. Wait for the timing set for "Automatically Launch by Time"
6. Check the monitor screen.



Result :  After waiting for the EM profile to automatically open , .mp4 & .avi video file will not be displayed  on the window4 & window7
Expectation : After waiting for the EM profile to automatically open , .mp4 & .avi video file should appear on the window4 & window7

description:

1. Open CMD > enter cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2.
2. Enter ddm /console start > wait for the DDM console to start.
3. After booting, return to CMD input
DDM /Console Start /[monitor's service tag]:WritePxPMode PiP-xxxxx [main input] [sub input]
(PiP-xxxxx can enter small or large)
(For main input, enter the main screen first. For sub-inputs, please refer to other signal sources of the current DUT)
Or enter DDDM /WritePxPMode pbp-xx <main input> <sub input>
(pbp-xx can enter other PBP modes)
(For main input, enter the main screen first. For sub-inputs, please refer to other signal sources of the current DUT)
4. Check whether the DUT sub-input is consistent with the description.

Result: After entering the command, the expected behavior of DUT main_input and sub input is inconsistent with the command.
Expectation: After entering the command, the expected behavior of DUT main_input and sub input is consistent with the command.

1. Set up two PCs connected to U4323QE and upstream the two PCs.
2. Open CMD on PC1 > enter cd C:\Program Files\Dell\Dell Display Manager 2.
3. Enter ddm /console start > wait for the DDM console to start.
4. After opening, return to CMD input DDM/console-boot/[monitor's service tag]:SwapUSB

Expectation: After entering the command, USB control is switched to PC2, and PC1 DDM should normally have control

title: [DDM 2.3.1] -  Release 10 : After EM Profile auto-launch, Chrome/Edge/.jpeg file fail to open in selected Window.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.5
PC model : ASUS UX435EG
OS version : Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (19045.4123)
Graphics Chipset :  Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor1 / FW: U2424HE / M3B101
Input Source : HDMI
description:
Test case : Easy Memory#61 Step1-4 & #28 Step1-4
Scenario 1: 
1. Connect DUT to PC.
2. Open software > main menu > Settings, tick "Auto-load at startup".
3. Open software > main menu > Easy Arrange > Easy Memory. Click + to create 
     Create a profile with following :
           - 2 windows custom layout
              Window1 : Outlook
               Window2 : google chrome
           - Select "Automatically Launch by Time"
           - Launch during PC start = tick. 
4. Click Finish.
5. Select this profile and apply. Check the monitor screen.
6. Wait for the timing set for "Automatically Launch by Time". Check the monitor screen.

Scenario 2 :
1. Connect DUT to PC.
2. Open software > main menu > Settings, tick "Auto-load at startup".
3. Open software > main menu > Easy Arrange > Easy Memory. Click + to create 
     Create a profile with following :
           - 4 windows  pre-defined layout
              Window1 : google chrome
              Window2 : Brave.Ink
              Window3 : YouTube.Ink
              Window4 : Microsoft Edge
           - Select "Automatically Launch by Time"
           - Launch during PC start = untick. 
4. Click Finish.
5. Select this profile and apply. Check the monitor screen.
6. Wait for the timing set for "Automatically Launch by Time". Check the monitor screen.

Scenario 3 :
1. Connect DUT to PC.
2. Open software > main menu > Settings, tick "Auto-load at startup".
3. Open software > main menu > Easy Arrange > Easy Memory. Click + to create 
     Create a profile with following :
      - 12 windows pre-defined layout
      - Assign the app to each windows.
          Window1 : Outlook App
          Window2 : .vsdx file 1 (Microsoft Visio files)
          Window3 : .vsdx file 2 (Microsoft Visio files)
          Window4 : .mp4 video file (open with Media Player)
          Window5 : .mov video file (open with VLC Media Player)
          Window6 : .wmv video file (open with Windows Media Player)
          Window7 : .avi video file (open with Movies & TV Player)
          Window8 : .tiff (picture file)
          Window9 : .bmp (picture file)
          Window10 : .gif (picture file)
          Window11 : .raw (picture file) 
          Window12 : .jpeg (picture file) 
      - Select "Automatically Launch by Time"
      - Launch during PC start = tick.
4. Click Finish.
5. Select this profile and apply. Check the monitor screen.
6. Wait for the timing set for "Automatically Launch by Time". Check the monitor screen.


Result : 
Scenario 1 : After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, Google Chrome does not open in Window2
Scenario 2:  After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, Microsoft Edge does not open in Window4
Scenario 3 : After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, .jpeg picture file does not open in Window12

Expectation: 
Scenario 1 : After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, Google Chrome should open in  Window2.
Scenario 2:  After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, Microsoft Edge should open in  Window4 
Scenario 3 : After waiting for Easy Memory Profile to open automatically, .jpeg picture file should open in Window12

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] -  Release 10 : 在未安裝 以及安裝DDM的情況下，執行 SACVT.exe 評估結果會產生很多故障訊息
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 10: Without and with DDM installed,Executing SACVT.exe assessment results will produce many error messages
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.5
PC model: Thena1 NQ  - Inspiron 5441  
(BIOS v0.4.5, 3/11/2024)
OS version: Windows11 Pro(24H2),26085.1
Graphics Chipset: Snapdragon(R) X Elite -X1E80100 - Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) GPU

Monitor1 / FW: P2422HE / M3B208
Input Source : USB-C
description:
Test case: Windows 11 SV2+: Smart App Control (SAC) Step 3
1. Download the attached folder and extract it on the SUT
2. Before installing DDM for testing, open the CMD window with the administrator to run the SACVT.exe.
3. Record the number/content of the failure information in generated log. 
4. Complete the DDM installation.
5. Open the CMD window with the administrator to run the SACVT.exe.
6. Check the number of the failure information in generated log, and then compare with previously recorded number. Check the content of the failure information in generated log.

Notes1:
If there are multiple components that need to be tested, please execute sub-step#2 every time one is installed to check the failure information. 
Please make sure Internet connection before run SACVT.exe
Do Windows Update if found SAC compliance issue, then run SACVT.exe again.

Result: Many fault messages will be generated
Expectation: 
1.Without DDM, SAC cannot have fault messages
2.With DDM, SAC cannot have DDM-related fault messages.

description:
Test case: Windows 11 SV2+: Smart App Control (SAC) Step 11
setup:Devices will begin in evaluation mode.
1. Check to make sure that all applications are update to the latest version.
2. Go to Settings -> Privacy & security -> Windows Security -> App & browser control.
3. Click on 'Smart App Control settings'.
4. Enable enforcement mode by toggling On.
5. Open Event Viewer, go to "Application and Services Logs> Microsoft> Windows> CodeIntegrity> Operational", clear the log files.
6. Execute the quick check for Dell Display Manager.
7. Check  'Smart App Control settings' mode

Result: After SAC clears log files and executes DDM in Enforcement mode, the mode becomes "OFF".
Expectation: stay in Enforcement mode

chinese: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 10 :在"Warlock-Inspiron 14 3420"上，安裝DDM會跳出"Windows Installer"視窗提示
title: [DDM 2.3.1] - Release 10 : For particular ARM PC, when installing DDM, the "Windows Installer" prompt box pops up.
system_information:
"DDM version: 2.3.1.5
PC model: Warlock-Inspiron 14 3420
OS version: Win11 Home (23H2 , 22631.3296)
Graphics Chipset: Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) 690 GPU

Input Source : USB-C
description:
Test case : Software Installation#9 #10  Step 2

Setup: Use PC with ARM processor support but not Tributo QC - XPS 9345 (13 inch)

Scenario 1 :
1. Download latest DDM application, unzip the DDM folder and open it.
2. Right click on the ddmsetup.exe file > Properties > Compatibility, under Windows on ARM > select "Change emulation settings > change the following settings and apply. Make sure Untick "Hide x64 emulation capability (x86 apps only)"
3. Run the .exe file to install DDM.

Scenario 2 :
1. Download latest DDM application, unzip the DDM folder and open it.
2. Right click on the ddmsetup.exe file > Properties > Compatibility, under Windows on ARM > select "Change emulation settings > change the following settings and apply. Tick "Hide x64 emulation capability (x86 apps only)"
3. Run the .exe file to install DDM.

Result : The "Windows Installer" window prompt pops
Expectation : The "Windows Installer" window not prompt pops

Input Source : DP
Monitor4 / FW : UP2720QA / M2B101 (ST: Qisda07)
Input Source : DP
description:
1. Connect DUT1 & DUT2 to PC.
2. Go to Software > Main Menu > Select DUT1 > Others > Application Settings. Click Export and save the file.
3. Disconnect DUT1 and DUT2 on PC1. Now, direct connect DUT3 and DUT4 to PC1.
4. Wait for message prompt to user to import settings. Click yes to import. 

Result : The windows notification does not pop up the message that DDM will restart.

Expectation : The windows notification should pop up the message that DDM will restart.
                       1. If current monitor connected does not have easy memory created, the message shown as  : Application settings applied to [Product model] successfully. [Software name] will restart.
                       2. If current monitor connected have easy memory created, the message shown as : Application settings applied to [Product model] successfully. The Easy Memory settings will be cleaned. Please setup Easy Memory again. [Software name] will restart.

system_information:

description:
Test case: Luminance, Brightness and Contrast 98-6.9 100-6.9

1. 
a) Use DUT supports ALS.
b) Open Software > Main Menu > Brightness/Contrast > Manual > Hotkey.
Make sure hotkey has been configured for brightness before.
2. Full UI > Brightness / Contrast.
3. Set the hotkey for Brightness+ to Ctrl+A and the hotkey for Brightness- to Ctrl+S.
4. Click Close.
5. Full UI > Birthness / Contrast > Auto.
6. Turn on Auto Brightness.
7. Press Ctrl+A or Ctlr+S.
8. Click Yes.
9. Observe the changes in the Brightness of DDM.

Result: There is no addition or subtraction of 5 from the current value.
Expectation: Add or subtract 5 from the current value.

Epic Link : MDDM-4006

Dependencies : 
Linked Issues = Discovered while testing
Issue = MDDM-4060

system_information:
DDM version : 2.3.1.6
PC:Thena LQ  - Latitude 7455     
- BIOS v0.4.8, (3/27/2024)    
- Win11 Pro (24H2 , 26073.5000)
Graphics Chipset : Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) GPU

Monitor1 / FW : U3224KB/M2T105
Input Source : TBT
description:
Test case:Software installation using CLI #185#186#187#188#189

1.Setup: Install previous version. 
2. Open Software and "Automatically notify when update is available" set to untick.
3. Change some hotkey, color auto mode setup, network KVM (if applicable). Please remember the settings. 
4. Open command Prompt from PC.
5. Type " start ddmsetup /verysilent /NotifyUpdate=true"
6. After DDM/DDPM installation, Go to software >main menu > Settings > Update.
7. Check "Automatically notify when update is available."

Result:"Automatically notify when update is available" is still unticked
Expectation:"Automatically notify when update is available" is ticked
※"Automatically notify when update is available" is still ticked after entering "start ddmsetup /verysilent /NotifyUpdate=false"
step 4 :
start ddmsetup /noupdate=true (#189 "Automatically notify when update is available" should untick.)
start ddmsetup /verysilent /autostartup=off (#188 "Auto-load at startup" is untick.)
start ddmsetup /verysilent /autostartup=on(#187 "Auto-load at startup" is tick.)
start ddmsetup /verysilent /NotifyUpdate=false (#186 "Automatically notify when update is available" is untick.)
start ddmsetup /verysilent /NotifyUpdate=true (#185 "Automatically notify when update is available" is tick.)

title: [DDM 2.3.1] -  Release 11 : Wait 24 hours to unlock and enter the wrong PIN code again, a notification will pop up saying PIN has been entered incorrectly for 10 times.
system_information:
DDM version: 2.3.1.6
PC1 model: ASUS-FX516PM
OS version: Windows 10 Home(22H2),19045.4291
